thread.title: BRIEF-PGT Innovations Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.19

title: BRIEF-PGT Innovations Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.19
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:36 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-PGT Innovations Q1 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.19 Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - PGT Innovations Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14
* Q1 SALES $140.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $129.6 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES 2018 NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $0.81 TO $0.98
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.86, REVENUE VIEW $563.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14, REVENUE VIEW $129.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
